description: For runners, to track your workouts, to organize your knowledge around running, and to set up a training plan.This template is a digital system to follow your running journey.Check your weekly mileageStrava IntegrationAssign a type of workout to your activities, Track your shoe wear Collect articles, notes on topics that interests you.
